TopicTitle: Switching to different vessels causes the skybox and planets to disappear

Articles.Content: As the title says. I'm certain it's a mod problem, and at first I thought it was planet shine but I deleted it and the problem persisted. The other visual mods I have are scatterer, EVE, and Stock Visual Enhancement.
You really need to provide a log file. Without a log file we have no idea of what going on.

I reported this the other day. Turn out it is a known issue due to scatterer.

Edited March 19, 2018 by ThatRedMelon
